mention.text: Kiev , Writing by Elizabeth Piper , Editing by Timothy Heritage -RRB- nL6N0NU37X ''

`` DONETSK , Ukraine -LRB- Reuters -RRB- - Pro-Russian separatists voted unanimously on Thursday in favor of holding a referendum on independence , defying calls by Russian President Vladimir Putin to postpone the vote to open the way for talks with the Kiev authorities .

Pro-Russian separatists voted unanimously on Thursday in favor of holding a referendum on independence , defying calls by Russian President Vladimir Putin to postpone the vote to open the way for talks with the Kiev authorities
the only way to prevent war
the regions of Donetsk and Luhansk
A man in civilian clothes holding a Kalashnikov assault rifle
the worst East-West standoff since the Cold War
a pensioner who declined to give her full name
